name: INRelevantShortcut
desc: An object that defines a shortcut and its relevance to the user.

items.name: init(shortcut: INShortcut)
items.desc: Creates a relevant shortcut with the specified shortcut.

items.name: var shortcut: INShortcut
items.desc: A reference to the shortcut used to create the relevant shortcut.

items.name: var shortcutRole: INRelevantShortcutRole
items.desc: The role of the relevant shortcut.

items.name: var relevanceProviders: [INRelevanceProvider]
items.desc: Additional relevance information attached to the shortcut.

items.name: var watchTemplate: INDefaultCardTemplate?
items.desc: The template that the Siri watch face uses to display the relevant shortcut.

items.name: var widgetKind: String?
items.desc: An identifier that associates the shortcut with the widget it influences.
